text.english: Introduce a variable:\[ \texttt{"} P \to Q \texttt{"} \text{ becomes }\texttt{"}\text{given $P$ prove $Q$}\texttt{"} \]\[ \texttt{"}\forall (x : nat) , P\texttt{"} \text{ becomes } \texttt{"}\text{given $(x : nat)$ prove $P$}\texttt{"} \]
text.italiano: Introduce una variabile:\[ \texttt{"} P \to Q \texttt{"} \text{ diventa }\texttt{"}\text{dato $P$ dimostra $Q$}\texttt{"} \]\[ \texttt{"}\forall (x : nat) , P\texttt{"} \text{ diventa } \texttt{"}\text{dato $(x : nat)$ dimostra $P$}\texttt{"} \]
